org.jsfml.graphics

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.graphics.Vertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class Vertex
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Defines a shape point with position, color and texture coordinates information.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Color color
      The vertex color.
      Vector2f position
      The vertex position.
      Vector2f texCoords
      The vertex texture coordinates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex(Vector2f position)
      Constructs a new vertex at the specified position with white color.
      Vertex(Vector2f position, Color color)
      Constructs a new vertex with the specified position and color.
      Vertex(Vector2f position, Color color, Vector2f texCoords)
      Constructs a new vertex with the specified parameters.
      Vertex(Vector2f position, Vector2f texCoords)
      Constructs a new vertex with the specified position and texture coordinates, with white color.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • position

        public final Vector2f position
        The vertex position.

      • color

        public final Color color
        The vertex color.

      • texCoords

        public final Vector2f texCoords
        The vertex texture coordinates.

        The unit space this information is measured in depends on the way the respective texture will be bound. By the default, the Texture.CoordinateType.NORMALIZED coordinate type is used.
